channel.title: Storybook on DanaCoding
channel.description: Recent content in Storybook on DanaCoding

item.title: Storybook 基础
item.description: 一、安装配置 在next.js项目中执行 npx sb init yarn storybook .storybook/preview.js 为 Storybook 配置 Next.js Images + import * as NextImage from "next/image"; + const OriginalNextImage = NextImage.default; + Object.defineProperty(NextImage, "default", { configurable: true, value: (props) => ( <OriginalNextImage {...props} unoptimized /> ), }); package.json 为 Storybook 提供 Next.js 公共目录 {
